website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight, fast antivirus program for people looking for a straightforward option that is easy to install and use.
pros: Works well with Windows right out of the box
Advanced firewall protection will keep viruses from affecting important components of the operating system
cons: Not as extensive in features as other options

customer_reviews.title: I don't recall it was like this the last time i purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Have used Webroot for five years running. Biggest reason for switching and staying this long has been that it is not very intrusive and does not consume resources and thus slow down the computer. This is the second time i bought from Amazon. Make sure you install it just when your subscription/ coverage is about to end. Otherwise you lose the remaining portion of your existing coverage. I don't recall it was like this the last time i purchased from Amazon. Upon contacting Webroot, I didn't receive any credit/recourse.
customer_reviews.author: FRN

customer_reviews.title: Software files all dated Feb and March of 2001
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the software on disk. When I inserted it into my computer and hit the setup file. It came up with a message that it could not be installed. I checked further and found all the files on the disk were dated Feb and March of 2001! No wonder it won't run on Windows 10!! Not sure if this was just a rare mistake on Amazon's part...........or something else.............DON'T BUY THIS ON DISK
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelley

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked well for me for the past year. It is easy to install and covers up to 5 devices. I use it on my cell phone and it provides excellent security as well as internet protection. It doesn't require much space and self updates. All this is done in the background while you are performing other tasks. It is reasonable the first time installed, however, if you renew the 2nd year the price doubles! I chose to repurchase the download again and reinstall the product. Difficult to do, but it works. My bank also recommended it. I hope this has been helpful.
customer_reviews.author: papabill65

customer_reviews.title: The have started with the popups...
customer_reviews.text: I've used webroot for years and it was a good small and fast antivirus. Recently they have started popping up links to articles and other crap like bit defender did. I will not stand for this kind of treatment from a product I paid for. I am here today to find a replacement for this program. I will never buy webroot again, just like I will never buy bit defender again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent AntiVirus and Internet Protection for Malware
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Webroot for over a decade. I have never had any Malware or Virus on my 4 PC's; EVER. Be careful about researching the different vendors. Only a few rank Webroot. This not because it is not a good product but because the independent labs do not know how to test this product. It does thing differently that the other competitors. But the reviewers that actually test this product independently find it is one of the best out there. Also Webroot is fast in its scanning and has the smallest footprint on the PC. You will not notice it during operation as it does not slow the PC at all.
customer_reviews.author: Al Bud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I've read lots of reviews and opinions regarding the need for anti-malware/virus software for MacBook Pro. Some products for Mac slow down the system or impede the functioning of some programs. Webroot is an American Company and the service technician helped me get it up and running. I have a new computer . . . going to very reputable sites and still Webroot found infected files in just the two short weeks I've owned this laptop. I'm very pleased. It's easy to use (for those of us who know little about computers) and I hope to re-up it after the first year. Highly recommend for MacBook Pro and other Mac users.
customer_reviews.author: clvmprofesora

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE YEAR DATE ON THE BACK OF THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I was told to re-order a few days later. Again I received the 2017 disc version. Has anyone else run into this problem? Seems to be getting ignored. I received the 2017 version, NOT the 2019 version. Returning immediately.
customer_reviews.author: natureboy9

customer_reviews.title: Easty to use and good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This operates seamlessly in the background. Non-intrusive. The absolute best customer service for anti-virus I've ever experienced. This was a renewal, so CD took me to internet to renew. Very fast and easy. Program includes permanent erase, which is a nice feature, and also works friendly with other anti-virus installed. Unlike some anti-virus programs that operate in the cloud, this one allows you to scan your files or computer without having to be connected to the Internet, even though overall the anti-virus works from the cloud. I don't know who created this program (so many are from other countries), but I like that it's based in Colorado instead of a foreign nation.
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Box opened and code revealed already
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a while ago and am just getting to the review unfortunately, but I bought the version where the activation code is supposed to be in the box. When I opened it up the code was peeled back and revealed already...so my thought process is it could already be used a few times and I am not getting all the devices of coverage I paid for. I never tried the code since if It worked my moral compass would make me keep the product. But I very possibly could have missed something in the description, but to me, I thought I ordered a brand new unopened box, and an unscratched code.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Good virus software but limited
customer_reviews.text: Powerful threat finder but doesn't do well on Time Machine back ups. Will find threats on backup drive but can't remove them. It seems that all the popular Virus remover software have the same limitations with Time Machine. The big negative for me is that you can't select a single attached drive to scan. The choice is to scan everything including all the attached drives or just scan the main drive. I would like the ability, like some other virus software, even free virus software, to scan individual drives or individual folders or directories or even individual files.
customer_reviews.author: Alan N. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: False misleading or incomplete Advertisement on Amazon Website
customer_reviews.text: False misleading or incomplete Advertisement on Amazon Website: 1. "Platform Windows 7" is an out of date statement; should say "Windows 10" or "Windows 7,8,9,10 PC or Mac" 2. Should explain "CD Included Does not INSTALL" 3. CD asks for you to subscribe for $79.99/year, Then Must Download to each device, subscription only" 4. Should say Free software download "Upgrades for 5 Years" 5. Should say Latest 2020 Web Root software available via download for each 5 devices.
customer_reviews.author: dry2

customer_reviews.title: Webroot Internet Security Complete 2017
customer_reviews.text: Installed this program today. The installation was easy. I am impressed with the security that the program offers. Significantly easier and faster than other programs I have used. So far, I am very, very pleased with the installation. I found this program while scanning Amazon's website. Initially, I was reluctant to try it. Frankly, I never knew that this program existed. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced Webroot with a new version, but in order to do so, I had to delete the old one, which was a big hassle. But worse yet, after installing the new one, my laptop was attacked by a Trojan, which was not recognizable by Webroot, or any Windows or Microsoft app. In order to remove the Trojan, I have to have a repair person remove EVERYTHING from the computer, and then replace it with a new version or Windows. I somehow think that the old or new Webroot did it, or at least was not able to deal with it... The one star is because I had to do it to send this. I rate it no star.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Says u can download to phones and pads. It gives you a link that is very confusing. Can get to load anywhere but my pc. Very deceiving!
customer_reviews.author: PISSED

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Webroot!
customer_reviews.text: I used Webroot last year and had no problems. I removed the first version and installed the new. Now I have continual red screens with loud beeping noise pop up advising me I have a virus and to call a number. Malware! I have tried running scans and it never finds anything. I have spent the money and will have to live with it. I have tried contacting them. I should have used a free security product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've had Webroot virus protection for sometime now and am well pleased with the product. I originally got it from the Best But Geek Squad. I was disappointed in the service I was receiving from the GS and wanted to eliminate them from the equation, so I contacted Webroot directly. I was very happy with the Webroot service. The quality of the product and Webroot's willingness to help me is why I purchased this software.
customer_reviews.author: Clarence White

customer_reviews.title: Antivirus
customer_reviews.text: Removing the sticker to get to the security code was not easy. To make matters worse. The security code ended up getting destroyed by trying lift the sticker. As a result, the product was useless. I will never purchase a antivirus download again.
customer_reviews.author: Dominick Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Best Antivirus around, 2nd to none.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best antivirus I have ever used, and my customers love it as well. It has received multiple awards from PC Mag over the past several years, and it only takes up about a megabyte of space on your hard drive. The virus definitions are stored in the Cloud, and it runs fairly fast on processors like Pentium and Celeron, and wickedly fast on those processors that end with a "K" (like 4930K). It will locate keyloggers, and bots with ease, and malware doesn't stand a chance. Do yourself a favor and buy Webroot Antivirus, as you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: BSG

customer_reviews.title: Over all satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My internet security was ready to expire, so I started looking on Amazon for a new one. I looked and looked and finally settled on Webroot. Webroot loaded quickly and immediately went to work. One of the things it corrected was a doz window that kept popping up on the screen, very annoying. I think it restored a dll file, also. It corrected one other problem and my computer was like new. On my laptop, which my granddaughter uses, it corrected 7 problems and now it runs like a new one. As for right now I am very happy with Webroot
customer_reviews.author: rex eskins

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Webroot Rocks! I was using just the Antivirus but needed more and it was about to expire. So I bought this, easy install and did not have to use the disc. Just go on the webroot console on pc, look for My account. Click the gear next to it, it will say enter new key code. Then click activate, it will upgrade you to internet security complete and you will start another year 5 Devices! Very good software! Fast Scans, Always up to date using the cloud. You Never have to click Update! NICE! Windows defender is cloud based but you still have to click update. This is Real Time software and Identity Protection ! NICE!

customer_reviews.title: Works effectively without getting in the way.
customer_reviews.text: Most other security software tend to get in the way and slow down te computer, or to take forever to get their updates, or to want constant inputs from the user. Webroot does its job effectively and fast. Any, by the way, it also works with WinXP as well.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent traveller

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC SOFTWARE, but beware of usurpers
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, but beware!!! If you have any issues at all (or even questions), do not call any number for Webroot other than that at their corporate headquarters in Colorado (303-442-3813). Other numbers you find on the internet are probably an outside, foreign "support" site. When you call them, they will take remote access of your computer and use information they garner for their own purposes. Nothing can be done because they are foreign companies. Forewarned is forearmed. THIS IS AN EXCELLENT PROGRAM TO REMOVE ANY AND ALL OUTSIDE GARBAGE FROM YOUR COMPUTER. And their support representatives (the real ones) are really helpful and nice.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH G.

customer_reviews.title: Renewed another year.
customer_reviews.text: Renewed my security service nice and easy after confirming I had got the right one .Emailed me quickly that they renew with any new code dispite the box cover difference. Only thing is don't renew till you get really close to end day because I lost 2weeks off mine for adding it too soon. Love this security software they've kept me safe for over 5 years and I tried many other security software that didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security At Last
customer_reviews.text: I have used many security software brands and have been let down throuugh most. I found this one last year after having purchased another brand only two months before, that was supposed to be "the best", only to have my computer compromised to the extent it had to have my computer guy take it for a couple of days. This was an expensive experience. I'm happy to say Webroot has been a very reliable software that I will keep. That other brand BTW had rave reviews from many sources. It took no time to invade.
customer_reviews.author: Caki

customer_reviews.title: ... clear as most but once installed very clear and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Instal is not as clear as most but once installed very clear and easy to use. It does a great job of reporting all attempts of programs that want to connect to the internet. If at user is not well informed about what to allow or not they will probably follow the recommendation of the program to block the attempt.. It always recommends blocking a program. This will result in problems of updating and usage of programs.. Other than those two hiccups it's a good solid program that does it's job.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install on a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Beware if you intend to use this on a Mac (Apple). My techy friend and I have yet to get it installed properly on a Mac. What you get is a Mac application that is supposed to take you to a site to allow you to get the software. What we have gotten is an application that will not open, and though we have tried several approaches, so far we have not been able to remove the application from the Mac. Works just fine on a Windows PC.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Best AV I've found so far. Kaspersky is good but slows your system significantly, don't get me started on McAfee and Norton...

Norton and McAfee are garbage and slow your system terribly; Kaspersky was my choice before Webroot and I immediately recognized significant performance gains using Webroot without a loss in system security after switching from Kaspersky. Kaspersky also STILL prompts with ads even on fully paid/licensed versions.

After a week this has been protecting our computers and most of all there has been no sign of our computers and laptops being slowed by the Web root software. I purchased Web root because I read several reviews saying it was one of the best for internet security. Free applications are okay, but all the ads for upgrades were becoming a nuisance.

There has been no change in speed or accessibility. I used Kaspersky for several years and was happy with it but this is highly rated and cost much less.

customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem with antivirus and Internet security software, performance degredation, is happily a thing of the past with Webroot. Start-up is much faster. Scans are quick and complete, even catching a virus that another, top-ranked s/w missed. I've used all of the most popular Internet security suites and nothing does a better job keeping me safe as quickly. I'm hooked! The fact that it's an American built product is great, too.....

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is working well. It has one "feature" that I struggled figuring out how to work around. It disables the numlock key while in a browser (like Chrome) so you can't use the arrow keys on the numlock. I contacted the company and they gave me a work around. I would give it 5 stars if it wasn't so difficult to figure out how to deal with this inconvenience. They should put in an option or make it easier to find the fix.

customer_reviews.title: always works great for us.

As for this purchase from amazon , i received it fast and sealed and code worked perfect and price was cheaper the local savings store that starts with a W, will definatly buy again next year.

Switched to Malwarebytes Professional. THAT's a good product, but they keep bugging me to upgrade when I have already upgraded! Terrible service but good product

I get it, you have a free anti-virus Avast and they have to get up to pay more for their services. I've had no issues and scan automatically upon start-up. I'm still running Windows 7 64-bit and works perfectly.

All that, and it’s still protected my pc better than Kaspersky, Norton, Mcafee (sp?) and the others! And well-priced if you search.

Also, because I have more than 5 devices it won't integrate into a single account. Not happy about that and wish that all subscriptions could be on one dashboard. For that even though this is a 4 for some things that we cant get working I must say that as a security product it is AMAZING!

Also, I have been getting warnings when visiting some sites that have pop-up ads that contain Trojans & blocks these from my computer. So, all in all, this blows Norton away. I just wish they would have a lifetime subscription or 3 year subscription instead of just yearly.

customer_reviews.author: 68EagleTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Weboot is Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I've used Webroot previously and was pleased, but after reading stellar reviews of Bitdefender I decided to give it a try. BIG MISTAKE!!! Bitdefender caused daily blue screen abends on both of my Windows 7 machines and would not download at all on my Windows 8 machine. Emails to tech support only resulted in a generic reply. Thankfully I was able to uninstall it and bought a new copy of Webroot. It's a great program in every way. Installation and setup was a breeze and no more system abends! I know better than to look elsewhere in the future. Thanks Webroot team!
customer_reviews.author: Spiritual Explorer

customer_reviews.title: This is suppose to be good for 5 devices but I was only able to download 2 computers.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be good for 5 devices and I was only able to download two of my computers. I'm very disappointed because I have three more computers have arrived two weeks ago and every time I down load it keep saying EXPIRED.
customer_reviews.author: shera

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, no conflicts so far
customer_reviews.text: I not qualified for a technical review. But I can say it was easy to install and does not seem to cause any probkens. To previous version was easy to uninstall.
customer_reviews.author: DHueber

customer_reviews.title: I have only had it a short time but it seems to be working real good. I got the one that secures 5 devices ...
customer_reviews.text: I checked reviews from the top rated security programs and this one rated the highest. I have only had it a short time but it seems to be working real good. I got the one that secures 5 devices because I have many devices that needed it, i.e. laptop, desktop, phone, tablet, etc. so it was nice that it covered everything. The only annoying thing was it kept notifying me on my phone that I had security, but I put it in the background so it wasn't showing up all the time. I prefer it to work in the background. Other than that I have had no problems with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patti2872

customer_reviews.title: Works fine even though its the old version.
customer_reviews.text: Don't be worried that this is an old version it updates to the current version when installed. If you already have weebroot on your computer just uninstall it before installing this one. Then you have to put the disc in all the other computers that you want protected.
customer_reviews.author: Rich C

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: The best coverage all year. Five computers AND incredibly easy to update it for another year! All I had to do was enter the new code for the year and good to go. And it allowed me the add the days I left to my new subscription. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: McArtsy

customer_reviews.title: Tech support
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use Tech support so I didn't give it a rating but but I love WEBROOT it tells me when a web site isn't good to go to. It's a great program. the price is right
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: It does protect well, I think, yet it causes conflicts and error messages that are annoying, and it's too the point now I'm not sure I believe them. Webroot responded to me that these issues would be resolved in future updates, but that's never happened, and I plan on not using it again.
customer_reviews.author: Duzzi

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived packaged well enough and on time. I have used Webroot internet security before and it has always worked well for me so i would recommend this product and seller to others.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Schnitzler

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Solid product, my 2nd year buying it. Buy one of these instead of renewing. Cheaper and simple restarts or extends existing service
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Hardy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this. No help unless you pay $98.00. Rip off
customer_reviews.author: Als Photography

customer_reviews.title: McAfee anit got nothing on this !
customer_reviews.text: This is really good my grandfather has been using it for years. Haven’t had any type of viruses and if you do get one just calm customer services. Impressed !
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: It's the Best
customer_reviews.text: So far this security ware has found a virus on two of my computers that other security ware didn't find. It runs silently in the background and doesn't bug me while I am trying to work. Had Norton for 2 years and got a virus and had to reformat my hard drive and it slowed my computer down horribly. The Webroot does not slow my computer down. I hardly know it is there. So far, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby A. Pender

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection for desktop
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Been using this software for the past four years! Easy to install; plus, there have been NO problems with viruses or security issues. Feel "safe" running this security software on my computer. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: CRL-USA

customer_reviews.title: Great security without sacrificing speed
customer_reviews.text: We just bought a new all-in-one desktop computer and after doing a lot of research we decided to go with the webroot security system. What I like most about this product is that the computer doesn't seem to have slowed down at all and I really don't even think about it being there because it runs seamlessly in the background and doesn't pop up constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It quickly provides solutions on my laptop and phone and allows syncing between the two. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth LaMarr

customer_reviews.title: A reasonable alternative to Norton
customer_reviews.text: I switched the home machines after over a decade from Norton to Webroot and it seems to work fine. We had web performance issues with Norton over the past 2 or 3 years so I switched to this product. It seems our performance is a bit better than under Norton and I like the five pack. I never liked McAfee, even when it came for free on computers and I'm not trusting my internet security to a company based in Moscow (Kaspersky).
customer_reviews.author: JJinNM

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like that after it's installed you don't have to think about it anymore. It does what it's designed to and the options are set one and done.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if its worth it
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this is not getting all the issues. I have malware on my computer that continues to open the internet over and over and using up 99% of the processing locking it up. I now have to seek a professional to take care of the problem
customer_reviews.author: tasha

customer_reviews.title: this works better than both
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for two years, always informs you of up-coming attack. Runs quickly and silently in the background. I have used Norton and Kaspersky, this works better than both.
customer_reviews.author: KES

customer_reviews.title: leading Internet Security Complete with Antivirus Protection
customer_reviews.text: yes , it is indeed- it is a leading Internet Security Complete with Antivirus Protection
customer_reviews.author: Mohammad Alamgir

customer_reviews.title: WEBROOT is now NUMBER 1; AGAIN !
customer_reviews.text: I am a return buyer, again. This time I purchased this 5 device Webroot for 2018. As in the past Webroot is by far the fastest and most reliable. Checking with PCmag's website - Webroot is still on top. Keep in mind the small "footprint" it leaves on your device. Since the "K" brand got busted for malware tracking bug Webroot is clean, fast, impressive! Now my smart phone, PC, laptop, and tablet all have Webroot.
customer_reviews.author: AmericanPatrick

customer_reviews.title: it was a good price. It is also quick
customer_reviews.text: Need to find something cheaper, but for 5 computers for a year, it was a good price. It is also quick. My last bout with Norton took 2 hours (a couple years ago). This was 20 minutes. Loaded it on other family machines and detected issues with them all. I already had this on my machine. Note that the Amazon price was less than the Webroot renewal price, which was too steep. That is why I was looking for another product. At this price for 5 computers, I'll stick with webroot.
customer_reviews.author: Nannie McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Great Internet protection
customer_reviews.text: Great Internet protection, I've been using Webroot for about 5 years now and I like it very much, it's quick and it works in the background while your browsing the internet, I like the simple interface and setup. I do recommend "Webroot Internet Security Complete" to anyone looking for complete Internet protection for their PC.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Skierski

customer_reviews.title: Easy Install
customer_reviews.text: Been using Webroot for years. It hasn't let me down and Amazon has the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: No service.
customer_reviews.text: It would not install on my mac desk top. I call tech support several time was told waite time over and hour. No way i want a program i have to waite that long.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: Doing What it Was Designed to Do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this largely because one of my computers is still running Windows XP, and many antivirus products have dropped support for XP. I have Webroot running on three PCs and one laptop. So far, Webroot is doing its job handsomely. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Crafts

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Buying directly from Webroot is foolish as their pricing structure is so expensive. I was able to get this at half the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Security Software Suite
customer_reviews.text: Have used Webroot Security for three years and have been very satisfied. It doesn't pick up malware as well as Malwarebytes software, but my previous security software suite also came in second place compared to Malwarebytes. The customer support with Webroot is excellent, in part because you are speaking with tech people in the US who can speak native English and are not reading to you from a manual.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: I for one think this is the best internet security software you can buy
customer_reviews.text: I for one think this is the best internet security software you can buy. Many others slow the computer down using a lot of it's resources...this one doesn't and does a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Newbie

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best protection ever, easy to contact company for help and they are very knowledgeable
customer_reviews.author: WERTYUIO

customer_reviews.title: Best one around.
customer_reviews.text: I would rather have multiple years of service rather that multiple devices. I.E. Two years for two or three devices instead of five devices for one year.
customer_reviews.author: Denis J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Much better and cheaper Virus program
customer_reviews.text: Great. I like a lot better than AVG. AVG kept saying everything was wrong and wanting more money. No nagging screens with Webroot. It scans much faster than AVG. My computer works better with this. Much cheaper also.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora of Boston

customer_reviews.title: Good interface, easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and appears to have a small footprint.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J. Sherrell

customer_reviews.title: This is a great program other than Problems installing over existing webroot that is running out of time.
customer_reviews.text: The product has been good for 3 years. However I have been unable to install upgraded pprogram. appears that I will have to delete old program.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gray

product_meta.title: Webroot Internet Security Complete with Antivirus Protection Software | 5 Device | 1 Year Subscription | PC/Mac CD with Keycard
product_meta.description: Platform:PC-Mac Disc| Edition:5 Device 1 YearThere's Always a New Cybersecurity Threat - Let Webroot Help. Nearly half of all consumers worldwide have been victims of cybercrime. Every link clicked, email opened, app downloaded, and network joined is an opportunity for hackers to compromise your personal data. Webroot offers complete protection from viruses and identity theft for all your devices - without slowing you down. Powerful, lightweight, and integrated protection for PC, Mac, and Android, Webroot Internet Security Complete with antivirus protects personal information by blocking the latest malware, phishing, and cyber-attacks. Fully cloud-based and faster than our competitors, we scan billions of apps, files, and websites continuously to determine where and what is safe online. This enables us to store malware definitions in the cloud and identify them in real-time, and provide an effective shield while maintaining a small footprint on your device. With more than 250,000 new malicious programs appearing each day, it is important to protect yourself along every step of your online routines, from shopping and banking to personal administration and social networking.
feature_bullets: BLOCKS VIRUSES & MALWARE: Always enjoy peace of mind knowing Webroot’s cloud-based antivirus software provides comprehensive internet security to shield your PC or Mac from malware attacks without slowing you down.

SAFER WEB BROWSING: Freely browse the web with Webroot’s total security software which proactively scans the internet to block phishing, ransomware, and other malicious attempts to steal your money and personal information.
NEVER SLOWS YOU DOWN: Efficiently scans your computer for viruses and malware in seconds and uses almost no storage space thanks to cloud-based architecture.
ADVANCED FEATURES: Premium internet security software includes all the features of Webroot Internet Security Plus, with extras like 25GB of online storage and a System Optimizer to keep devices

IDENTITY THEFT PREVENTION: Feel secure about conducting your daily businesses on the web. Webroot defends you against identity theft by protecting your private information like usernames, passwords, account numbers, and more.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
